valsi.definition: pro-sumti: a recent sumti before the last one, as determined by back-counting rules.
srana modal, 1st place pertained to by ... (generally more specific).
$x_1$ is a relative clause attached to argument $x_2$ with predicate relation $x_3$ among arguments $x_4$.
digit/number: repeating digits (of a decimal) follow.
$p_1=r_2$ are the retained earnings of company/corporation/firm/partnership $p_2=r_1$ resulting from business activity $p_3$.
krasi modal, 1st place from source/origin/starting point ...
$g_1$ maintains $g_2=r_1$ (event/state) over interval $r_2$.
$x_1$ is the integral of $x_2$ with respect to $x_3$ over $x_4$.
flag GOhA to indicate pro-assignment context updating for all pro-assigns in referenced bridi.
single-word rafsi quote; quotes a single word delimited by pauses (in speech) or whitespace (in writing) and treats it as a rafsi
valsi.notes: Useful for quoting rafsi that aren't legal words on their own. See http://www.lojban.org/tiki/Unspeakable+rafsi+gotcha for details.

valsi.definition: discursive: chiefly - equally - incidentally.
discursive: chiefly - equally - incidentally.
discursive: chiefly - equally - incidentally.
$r_1=b_1$ is the Arabic language used by $b_2$ to express/communicate $b_3$ (si'o/du'u, not quote).
$x_1$ is a dromedary/Arabian camel of breed $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ (action/activity/behavior) is sane/rational by standard $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a rabbit/hare/[doe] of species/breed $x_{2}$.
$x1=j1$ is careful with $x2=r1=j2$
$x_1$ admits/accepts/acknowledges/allows/concedes/recognizes that $x_2$ is true about $x_3$ on grounds/under compelling evidence $x_4$
$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ radian(s) [metric unit] in angular measure (default is 1) by standard $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Measured in degrees ({julra'o}); right ascension astronomical measurement. (= {cacryra'o}). See also {jganu}, {kilto}, {centi}, {decti}, {dekto}, {femti}, {gigdo}, {gocti}, {gotro}, {gutci}, {litce}, {megdo}, {mikri}, {milti}, {minli}, {nanvi}, {petso}, {picti}, {terto}, {xatsi}, {xecto}, {xexso}, {zepti}, {zetro}.

valsi.definition: $x_1=r_1=c_1$ abandons / gives up $x_2=r_2=c_2$ under condition $x_3=r_3=c_3$
$x_{1}$ is an affix/suffix/prefix/combining-form for word/concept $x_{2}$, form/properties $x_{3}$, language $x_{4}$.
$x_1$ is the morphology of language $x_2$ according to methodology $x_3$.
$x_1$ is a Malpighian tubule [excretory organ] of insect $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is located across/on the other side of gap/boundary $x_{2}$ from $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ is opposite (fi) $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Also: $x_1$ is over there (across/beyond zo'e); directly across/beyond a boundary/gap, generally at the shortest plausible distance on the other side of the boundary. See also {dukti}, {kuspe}, {bancu}, {kruca}, {cripu}, {pagre}.

valsi.definition: traji modal, 1st place with superlative ...
$x1=s1=b1$ straightens in reference frame $x2=s2$
$x_1$ is a column vector of dimension $x_2$ with coordinates $x_3$, $x_4$, ...
$s_1=rs_1$ is a vertical rock face / rock surface of rock / mountain $rs_2$ on side $rs_3$ with edges $rs_4$, vertical in reference frame/gravity $s_2$.
valsi.notes: Technically necessary ke (or bo) dropped. Cf. {sraji}, {roksfe}, {fenra}, {cmana}, {farlu}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is tall according to standard $x_{2}$.
$z_1=c_1=s_1$ is taller than $z_2$ by amount $z_4$.
$t_1=c_1=s_1$ is the tallest among set/range $t_4$.
$x_1$ is a column/file of table/chart $x_2$.
$se_1=sr_1$ is a ladder / vertical stairway for climbing structure $se_2$ with steps $se_3$, vertical in reference frame $sr_2$.
$c_1$ carves inscription/text $c_2$ on to $c_3=s_2$ using $c_4=s_1$.
$x_1$ itches at locus $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ reflects Iraqi culture/nationality in aspect $x_{2}$.
$g_1$ is Iraq.
$x_{1}$ (object/person/event/situation) troubles/disturbs $x_{2}$ (person) causing problem(s) $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Also afflicts, is disruptive to, troublesome; $x_1$/$x_3$ are a care to $x_2$, $x_2$ is troubled by/cares about $x_1$/$x_3$ (= selra'u for reordered places). See also {dicra}, {fanza}, {zunti}, {kurji}, {xanka}, {nabmi}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is delicate/fragile/subtle/refined in property $x_{2}$ (ka).
valsi.notes: Easily damaged or rendered less pleasing/pure/effective. See also {jdari}, {ranti}, {tsali}, {milxe}, {kukte}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is principal/chief/leader/main/[staple], most significant among $x_{2}$ (set) in property $x_{3}$ (ka).
valsi.notes: Staple (= {ralselpra}); general/admiral/president/principal leader (= ralja'a, ralterbe'e; use additional terms to distinguish among these); also primary, prime, (adverb:) chiefly, principally, mainly; ($x_2$ is complete specification of set). See also {vajni}, te {bende}, {minde}, {lidne}, {jatna}, {jitro}, {gidva}, {midju}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is a/the capital of $x_2$.
valsi.notes: Cf. {ralju}, {tcadu}. More general than {trutca}. May be the financial (e.g. New York in USA), industrial (e.g. Sao Paulo in Brazil) or religious (e.g. Mecca in Saudi Arabia) capital of its polity but not necessarily the seat of government.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ retains/keeps/holds $x_{2}$ in its possession.
$r_1$ is the frequency of the carrier wave of signal $b_1$.
Ramadan
$x_1$ is a rambutan (Nephelium lappaceum) of breed $x_2$
$x_1$ is the Ramadan/Ramazan of year $x_2$.
$b_1=r_1$ is velvet made from material $b_2$.
$x_{1}$ yields/gives way/surrenders to $x_{2}$ (force/agent) under conditions $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the body organ [body-part] of body/species $x_{2}$ performing function $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is an orangutan of variety $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ (event/state) continues/persists over interval $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ (property - ka) is continuous over $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a myth/legend, a culturally significant story about $x_{2}$ in mythos $x_{3}$ of culture $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: Also: $x_1$ is mythical/fairy tale; used adjectivally for non-humanoid creatures (= {ramda'u}) of story/myth/legend/religion, e.g. dragon; fairy tale (= {veryranmi}). See also {lijda}, {lisri}, {crida}.

valsi.definition: $d_{1}$=$m_{1}$=$r_{1}$ is a/the soft palate of $m_{2}$.
$x_1$ is a dragon of species/breed $x_2$ in mythos $x_3$ of culture $x_4$
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of bronze of composition including $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is soft/malleable/moldable/yielding to force $x_{2}$ in conditions $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is ironic(al)/contrary to expectation $x_{2}$ in state/property/aspect $x_{3}$.
$z_1=c_1$ (experiencer) increases in skill / expertise at $z_2=c_2$ by amount $z_3$ by means of repeating action $r_1$ $r_2$ times.
$x_1$ is a remake/re-invention of $x_2$
$x_{1}$ [action] repeats/is repeated for a total of $x_{2}$ (quantity) occurrences.
$c_1$ repeats $c_2$ (sedu'u/text/lu'e concept) for audience $c_3$ via expressive medium $c_4$, $r_2$ times (default: one).
$x_1$ is a shuttle between $x_2$ and $x_3$, traveling along route $x_4$, carrying passengers $x_5$.
$d_1$ beats/hits repeatedly $d_2$ using $d_3$ at locus $d_4$, $r_2$ times.
$b_1$ is a natural language spoken by community $b_2$ to express $b_3$.
valsi.notes: As opposed to constructed spoken languages. Cf. {runbau}

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is the natural logarithm of $x_2$.
$x_1$=$j_1$ thinks/knows by instinct/feels that $x_2$=$j_2$ [opinion] (du'u) is true about subject/issue $x_3$=$j_3$
valsi.notes: From {rarna} and {jinvi}. Drawing conclusions without a proper reasoning, using 'gut feelings' or preconscious thoughts.

valsi.definition: $k_1=r_1$ (NU) is a natural right of $k_2$ (individual/mass) by standard $k_3$.
valsi.notes: Rights which are not contingent upon the laws, customs, or beliefs of a particular society or polity, thus necessarily universal; usually contrasted to legal rights ({flakrali}), which are culturally and politically relative. Cf. {krali}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is natural/spontaneous/instinctive, not [consciously] caused by person(s).
$f_2=r_1$ is an instinctive reaction from $f_1$ to stimulus $f_3$ under condition $f_4$.
$x_1$ is organically grown at $x_2$ by $x_3$ on farm $x_4$.
$z_1=r_1$ is a natural right for $z_1$ to do/be $z_2$ (event/state).
$x_1$ is an oil lamp using animal or vegetable products, illuminating $x_2$ with light $x_1$.
$x_1$ is an oilbird of breed $x_2$.
$x_1$ is rape/canola/yu choy of variety $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a rat of species/breed $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is a mouse/rat (family Muridae) of species/breed $x_2$
valsi.notes: Cf. {ratcu}, {smacu}, {mabru}. This term is a combination of ratcu + smacu for those speakers (Chinese, for instance) who don't usually distinguish between mice and rats.

valsi.definition: $x_1=m_1$ is the nucleus of atom $x_2=m_2=r_1$.
$x_{1}$ is an atom of element/atomic number $x_{2}$ of isotope number/atomic weight $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: (cf. kantu for a basic unit of a property or activity; selci for a basic physical subunit, generally of a mass)

valsi.definition: $s_1$ is nuclear physics with methodology $s_2$.
digit/number: enough; subjective.
quantified selbri: converts enough to cardinal; $x_{1}$ is a set with members $x_{2}$, enough by std. $x_{3}$.
quantified selbri: converts enough to ordinal; $x_{1}$ is enoughth among $x_{2}$, order rule $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is a/the rabbi of/in community $x_2$.
$f_1=r_1$ is absurd, contrary to expectation $r_2$ in aspect $r_3$.
$c_1$ (agent) expresses $c_2$ (sedu'u/text/lu'e concept) with irony for audience $c_3$ via expressive medium $c_4$..
$c_1$ is sarcastic to $c_2$ about $c_3$.
$x_1=r_1$ is sardonic to $x_2$ in property/aspect $x_3=r_3$.
$br_1=ba_1$ is the Brazilian Portuguese language used by $ba_2$ to express/communicate $ba_3$ (si'o/du'u, not quote)
$b_1=g_1$ is Brazil.
digit/number: 2 (digit) [two].
unary mathematical operator: matrix transpose/dual; A*.
$v_1$=$jt_1$=$r_1$ is HIV [Human immunodeficiency virus] of $jt_2$.
$z_1$ is a house for human being $z_2=r_1$.
emotion category/modifier: religious/spiritual/worship - sacrilege.
emotion category/modifier: spiritual/worship - sacrilege.
vocative: ready to receive - not ready to receive.
vocative: ready to receive - not ready to receive.
location tense relation/direction; adjacent to/touching/contacting ...
converts number to an objectively quantified ordinal tense interval modifier; defaults to time.
$c_1$ is a carnivore that eats the meat/flesh of animal $r_2$.
$x_1$ is November of year $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the tail/appendix [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [metaphor: trailing, following portion/appendage].
$r_1$ is a lizard of species $r_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains meat/flesh from source/animal $x_{2}$.
$c_1=k_2$ restarts for the $k_3$rd time.
$r_1$ (event) restarts $c_1=k_2$ for the $k_3$rd time.
$c_1$ reloads $c_2=kr_2$ from $c_3=ki_1$.
$m_1$ resends/forwards/remails $m_2$ to $m_3$ from $m_4$ through carrier $m_5$ for the $k_3$rd time; $m_1$ is a forwarder/remailer.
$b_1=s_1$ recognizes $s_2$ (object/abstract).
$c_1$ repeats/recapitulates $c_2$ (sedu'u/text/lu'e concept) to audience $c_3$ via expressive medium $c_4$, $k_3$ times (default:one).
$g_1$ redoes $g_2=k_2$ for the $k_3$th time.
digit/number: hex digit E (decimal 14) [fourteen].
$x_1$ is Rainbow Dash from My Little Pony
$c_1=p_3$ asks question $c_2=p_1$ to $c_3=p_4$ via expressive medium $c_4$, about subject $p_2$.
$g_1$ records / saves $r_2$ onto medium $r_4$.
number/quantity: 2,000 expressed with comma.
$p_1$ is (a) bisexual.
$x_1$ is bisexual;.
$c_1$ is bisexual in situation $c_2$ by standard $c_4$.
$x_1$ is a Tuesday of week $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$.
$x_1$ is a number sign/hash/double cross symbol (#)
February.
$x_1$ is February/the second month of year $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$.
$j_1$ has the rank of Captain/Lieutenant/Flight Lieutenant (equivalent of NATO OF-2) in military unit /organization $j_2$.
valsi.notes: Cf. {so}, {moi}, {jatna}, {jemja'a}, {vairsoi}, {cibmoija'a}, {pavmoija'a}. Based on STANAG 2116: NATO Codes for Grades of Military Personnel.

valsi.definition: $m_1=d_1$ is the index finger of $d_2$.
$x_1$ is a 2-dimensional vector with coordinates $x_2$ and $x_3$.
$p_1$ is twice/double $p_2$; $p_1$ is $p_2$ multiplied by 2.
Venus.
$p_1$ is the second closest planet (default is Venus if p2 is the Sun) revolving around $p_2$ (default is the Sun), with planetary characteristics $p_3$, orbital parameters $p_4$.
$x_1$ is a pair of scissors with blades $x_2$.
$j_2$ is a dipole with ends including $j_1$.
$t_2$ is two-legged with legs $t_1$.
$m_1$ is a bicycle/motorcycle carrying $m_2$ on surface $m_3$, propelled by $m_4$.
$x_1$ is Pisces [constellation/astrological sign].
valsi.notes: From {re}, {finpe}. The constellation is commonly represented as two fish, each of which is tied to the same point by a long length of string. The fish are connected at the tails.

valsi.definition: discursive: second utterance ordinal.
quantified selbri: convert 2 to cardinal selbri; $x_{1}$ is a set with the pair of members $x_{2}$.
$v_1$=$jt_1$=$r_1$ is HIV [Human immunodeficiency virus] of $jt_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a human/human being/man (non-specific gender-free sense); (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is human.
quantified selbri: convert 2 to ordinal selbri; $x_{1}$ is second among $x_{2}$ ordered by rule $x_{3}$.
$r_1$ is humanoid/man-like in quality $s_3$.
$m_1=r_1=s_1$ is an automaton [mostly unintelligent android/humanoid machine] for purpose $m_2$.
valsi.notes: s2 is subsumed. See also {crida}. Made from {remna} + {simsa} + {minji}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is an ape of species $x_2$.
$x_1$ hates humans/humanity; (adjective:) $x_1$ is misanthropic.
$l_1$ is human breast milk/mother's milk from human $r_1$.
number/quantity: 20 [twenty].
quantifier selbri: convert 20 to cardinal selbri; $x_{1}$ is a set with the score of members $x_{2}$.
number/quantity: 200 [two hundred].
$x_{1}$ throws/launches/casts/hurls $x_{2}$ to/at/in direction $x_{3}$ (propulsion derives internally to $x_{1}$).
$x_{1}$ survives/endures/undergoes/abides/lasts/persists through $x_{2}$ for interval/duration $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Also lasts out, withstands; $x_1$ persists/lasts for duration $x_3$; (adjective:) $x_1$ is tough/durable. See also {ranji}, {kuspe}, {randa}, {lifri}, {stali}, {temci}.

valsi.definition: $t_1$ is a railed vehicle station/depot/yard in transport system $t_2=t_3$ for cars/wagons/units $tr_2$ (default heavy rail) propelled by $tr_4$
$m_1=c_1$ is a harvester/reaper/machine for harvesting crop $c_2$ from source $c_3$.
valsi.notes: implied m2 is "lo nu crepu c2 c3".

valsi.definition: $c_1$ is a slingshot/catapult with munition/projectile $c_2=r_2$.
$g_1=r_2$ is a javelin made of $g_2$ thrown by $r_1$.
tense interval modifier: twice; objectively quantified tense; defaults as time tense.
$x_{1}$ is a reptile of species/breed $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is a monitor lizard of species/variety $x_2$.
$pe_1$ wonders about $pe_2=pr_2$.
$c_1=p_3$ asks/puts question $c_2=p_1$ (sedu'u/text/lu'e concept) of/to $c_3=p_4$ via expressive medium $c_4$ about subject $p_2$.
pro-sumti: the last sumti, as determined by back-counting rules.
rinka modal, 1st place (phys./mental) causal because ...
sumti question asking for a physical cause; why?.
rinka modal, 1st place (phys./mental) despite cause ...
attitudinal modifier: release of emotion - emotion restraint.
attitudinal modifier: release of emotion - emotion restraint.
$k_1$ is a bank of river $k_3=r_1$.
$x_1$ is a hippopotamus of genus/species $x_2$.
lifri modal, 1st place patient/passive case tag; happens to...,experienced by...,with passive...
$g_1$ is a mace/[ceremonial staff] made of $g_2$ used for purpose $r_2$ by custom/in community $r_3$.
trinary mathematical operator: [integral of a with respect to b over range c].
$x_1$ is a quantity of kale/borecole/boerenkool of species/strain $x_2$
$x_1$ is a lime of variety $x_2$.
$x_1$ is an almond [fruit] of species/variety $x_2$
$t_1$ is green tea brewed from $t_2$.
location tense relation/direction; rightwards/to the right of ...
$g_1$ restrains/constrains/holds back $r_1$ using restraint $r_2$, against $r_3$ (event).
$d_1=r_2$ is a seat belt/strap/leash made of $d_2$ for restraining $r_1$
$f_{1}$ is a forest with predominant tree species/cultivar $t_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is rich/wealthy in goods/possessions/property/aspect $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is a cherry tree of species $x_2$.
$x_1$ is a plum/peach/cherry/apricot/sloe tree of species/variety $x_2$.
$tu_1$ is a forest of $tr_1$.
$x_1=c_1$ is resin (hydrocarbon secretion) of plants $x_2=c_2=t_1$
$g_1$ is a/the forest products industry/sector producing forest products $g_2$ from tree species $t_2$ by process $g_3$
$x_{1}$ is a squirrel of species $x_{2}$.
$x1=v4$ is a stump of tree $x2=t1=v3$
$z_1$ is a treehouse of/for $z_2$ on tree $t_1$ of species $t_2$.
$x_{1}$ is repugnant to/causes disgust to $x_{2}$ under conditions $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is made of/contains/is a quantity of silver/argentum (Ag); [metaphor: valuable, tarnishing].
$x_1$ is silvery/silver-colored when viewed by $x_2$ under conditions $x_3$.
$s_1$ is the diachronics/diachronic linguistics of $s_2=b_1$.
$x_{1}$ (sequence/non-text quote) is a rhythm/beat of music/expressive form $x_{2}$.
valsi.notes: Not necessarily oscillatory/regular pattern. See also {damri}, {pemci}, {tonga}, {zgike}, {slilu}, {dikni}, {sanga}, {morna}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ rhymes/alliterates with $x_{2}$ in language/phonetics $x_{3}$, matching sound correspondence $x_{4}$ (ka).
valsi.notes: Broad meaning of rhyme - any matching sound correspondence. See also {pemci}, {sanga}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ liquid/fluid drains/strains/flushes from source $x_{2}$ through drain/strainer $x_{3}$ by force $x_{4}$.
$x_{1}$ is restrained/held [back]/constrained/kept by restraint $x_{2}$ against $x_{3}$ (event).
valsi.notes: Also: $x_2$ is a restraint/binding for $x_1$, $x_2$ keeps/restrains/holds [back]/constrains $x_1$ from $x_3$ (= selri'u for reordered places); agentive restraint (= {ri'urgau}, {ri'urzu'e}). See also {zifre}, {ralte}, {pinfu}, {kavbu}, {fanta}, {jgari}, {jimte}, {bapli}, {curmi}, {kluza}, {tagji}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ (event/state) effects/physically causes effect $x_{2}$ (event/state) under conditions $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: $x_1$ is a material condition for $x_2$; $x_1$ gives rise to $x_2$. See also {gasnu}, {krinu}, {nibli}, te {zukte}, se {jalge}, {bapli}, {jitro}, cmavo list {ri'a}, {mukti}, {ciksi}, {xruti}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ (agent) greets/hails/[welcomes/says hello to]/responds to arrival of $x_{2}$ in manner $x_{3}$ (action).
valsi.notes: (cf. friti for welcome/hospitality, cmavo list coi, cmavo list co'o)

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ [member] is rare/unusual/uncommon/atypical in property $x_{2}$ (ka) among members of $x_{3}$ (set).
valsi.notes: ($x_3$ is complete specification of set); (cf. cizra, fadni, cafne, kampu, cnano - the generalized opposite to any/all of these concepts)

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a parent of/raises/rears $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ mentors/acts parental toward child/protege $x_{2}$.
River
$x_{1}$ is a river of land mass $x_{2}$, draining watershed $x_{3}$ into $x_{4}$/terminating at $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: (cf. flecu, senta for most metaphorical aspects; daplu, djacu, lalxu, xamsi, rinci, naxle)

valsi.definition: $f_1$ is a rice field of $r_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of rice [a type of grain] of strain/cultivar $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the heart [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [emotional/shape metaphors are NOT culturally neutral].
$p_1$ is a quantity of congee of ingredients including $p_2$
$v_1$ is made of/contains/is a quantity of rice wine from rice strain/cultivar/location $r_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a rite/ceremony/ritual for purpose/goal $x_{2}$, by custom/in community $x_{3}$, with form/rules $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: [also: $x_1$ is formal, Legal. $x_1$ is 'going through the motions']; $x_4$ constraints/customs; See also {lijda}, {malsi}, {flalu}, {javni}, {tcaci}, {clite}, {junri}.

valsi.definition: $g_1$ is Great Britain (country).
$x_{1}$ avoids/evades/shuns/escapes/skirts [fate] $x_{2}$ (event) through action/state $x_{3}$ (event).
valsi.notes: Also detours around, stays away from; ($x_1$ is normally an object, but may be an event). See also bandu which is not necessarily successful, {fanta}, which is agentive, se jersi which implies an opposing agent, {sisku}, {kalte}, {fapro}.

valsi.definition: $tra_1=tri_1$ is furthest to the back out of set/range $tra_4$ in frame of reference/based on facing $tri_3$.
$t_1=b_1$ contains $b_2$ wrapped with $b_3$ to be hauled on the back of $t_2$.
digit/number: each, all.
emotion category/modifier: social - antisocial.
emotion category/modifier: social - antisocial.
emotion category/modifier: mental - mindless.
emotion category/modifier: mental - mindless.
emotion category/modifier: emotional - denying emotion.
emotion category/modifier: emotional - denying emotion.
emotion category/modifier: physical - denying physical.
emotion category/modifier: physical - denying physical.
emotion category/modifier: sexual - sexual abstinence.
emotion category/modifier: sexual - sexual abstinence.
Robin.
logically quantified universal sumti: everything (unless restricted).
converts number to an objectively quantified tense interval modifier; defaults to time tense.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/is made of/contains rock/stone of type/composition $x_{2}$ from location $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: $x_2$: composition including $x_2$, which need not be complete specification. See also {kunra}, {jemna}, {canre}.

valsi.definition: $s_1$ is a rock face / rock surface of rock / mountain $s_2=r_1$ on side $s_3$ with edges $s_4$.
valsi.notes: Rock composition and origination dropped. Made from {rokci} + {sefta}.

valsi.definition: $s_1$=$r_1$ is petrology [science about rock/stone] based on methodology $s_3$.
valsi.notes: terdi2, terdi3 and saske2 subsumed. See also {derske},{kunske},{rokci}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is lithium.
$s_1=r_1$ is a pebble/piece of stone of type/composition $r_2=s_2$ from location $r_3$.
$r_1=k_1$ is a cornerstone of structure $k_2$ of stone type/composition $k_3=r_2$.
$x_1$ is every night
$p_1$ loves everyone and everything.
discursive utterance ordinal: finally; last utterance ordinal.
Rome
$x_{1}$ is a highly reflective/polished non-tarnishing metallic surface, of metal $x_{2}$ [often chromium].
quantified selbri: is final among; convert all to ordinal selbri; $x_{1}$ is last among $x_{2}$, rule $x_{3}$.
$r_1=g_1$ is the European Union with member states $g_2$ (mass)
$z_1=ri_2$ is orchestral music (classical music or music written in a classical style) produced/performed by $z_2=ri_1$ (event), with form/rules/in tradition $ri_4$.
$ru_1=ro_1$ is $ru_2$ euros.
$r_1=t_1$ is Europe
$x_{1}$ reflects European culture/nationality/geography/Indo-European languages in aspect $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ engenders/procreates/begets $x_{2}$ with coparent $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is a generation [contemporary offspring] of $x_2$.
tense interval modifier: always; objectively quantified tense; defaults as time tense.
$x_{1}$ is thick in dimension/direction $x_{2}$ by standard $x_{3}$; [relatively long in smallest dimension].
$x_{1}$ is a rose [flower - characterized by prickly stem/fragrance] of species/strain $x_{2}$.
valsi.notes: Roses are not all pink; avoid using for color rose, which might be labyxu'e. See also {spati}, {xunre}.

valsi.definition: pro-sumti: a remote past sumti, before all other in-use backcounting sumti.
evidential: I postulate.
attitudinal: weak intensity attitude modifier.
tense interval modifier: continuously; subjective tense/modal; defaults as time tense.
tense interval modifier: occasional/intermittent/discontinuous; defaults as time tense.
shift letterals to Cyrillic alphabet.
location tense relation/direction; surrounding/annular ...

valsi.notes: Artificial languages do not necessarily have speakers, cf. {bangu}.
